Most commonly used datasets: dated attacks artificial in nature trivial artifacts dont represent the true nature of an attacker
Network warfare games: zero day attacks potential for scalability human driven interaction
What is the Cyber Defense Exercise? Annual network warfare competition Numerous service academies (09 participants):

United States Military Academy at West Point Naval Post Graduate School AFIT (2 teams) United States Naval Academy United States Air Force Academy United States Merchant Marine Academy United States Coast Guard Academy Royal Canadian Military Academy
Students must defend computer networks from constant attack Attackers form the Red Cell Red Cell comprised of National Security Agency and
Department of Defense experts Competition spans four days Red Cell offensive operations authorized 9:00 am to 4:00 pm
